alert.note: Alert for Chuska Mountains; Far Northwest Highlands; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood; Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Southwest Mountains; Tusas Mountains Including Chama (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 30 at 3:39AM MST until December 02 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches, except 3 to 6 inches above 7,500 feet, and 6 to 10 inches above 9,000 feet. * WHERE...Sandia and Manzano Mountains including Edgewood, Chuska Mountains, Far Northwest Highlands, Southwest Mountains, Tusas Mountains Including Chama, and Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Some roads may be closed. Significant travel delays are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: Chuska Mountains; Far Northwest Highlands; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood; Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Southwest Mountains; Tusas Mountains Including Chama
